values.name: add
values.label: additive
values.text: A function $v$ is additive iff for any disjoint sets $S$ and $T$, we have $v(S ∪ T) = v(S) + v(T)$.

values.name: subadd
values.label: sub-additive
values.text: A function $v$ is sub-additive iff for any disjoint sets $S$ and $T$, we have $v(S ∪ T) ≤ v(S) + v(T)$.

values.name: superadd
values.label: super-additive
values.text: A function $v$ is super-additive iff for any disjoint sets $S$ and $T$, we have $v(S ∪ T) ≥ v(S) + v(T)$.
